content.raw:
I've created an ignition-msgs1 formula, but the release-tools scripts aren't checking which the ign-msgs major version, so this homebrew build is still broken:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/9

the homebrew build should work once we switch to ign-cmake in pull request #40

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/11
